overview: Oriental beauty China Mai Lin has been suspended in time by Love Goddess Nina Hartley because she has never found sexual satisfaction. You can imagine what a woman would like who is "hanging" around in a supernatural state waiting for Mr. Right to get her off. That's correct, she has become the ... China Bitch! The Love Goddess has other customers who are in need of her services. Asian doll Mariko is also looking for a tryst of extra-terrestrial proportions. Will the Love Goddess be able to render the poor souls complete through sex? You know she can! Join her as she makes complete these wanton souls so they may achieve a "higher plane" and watch her make a sexual angel of the China Bitch.
title: China Bitch
